name: Bullet Time
description:
Bullet Time is the new shooting fun game. Mafia took your dog and you are coming for a big revenge! Use only one bullet and one shot to kill them all. Are you ready to test your shooting skills with one shot ONLY?

Features:

⚈ Beautiful graphics
⚈ Make one aimed shot and control the bullet to neutralize mafia enemies!
⚈ Destroy all enemies and save your lovely dog from them.
⚈ Customize your character, dress him in the store and show what a cool look.
⚈ Large selection of levels at the top of the modern city.
⚈ And many more...
